channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree is unsafe, 6th September
item.description:
Over the last 2 weeks large branches have fallen off in the wind. Today 2 branches came down on our drive while we were out there and another on the pavement nearly hitting a car. The tree has many branches ready to fall and is a danger.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crofton Lane, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: HUMANS major noise nuisance, 6th September
item.description:
Adidas shop Oxford Street opposite Selfridges. Uproar rock band bass drumming noise problem for an hour. All down side roads where people live. Cannot hear ourselves talk. This is not allowed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 421-429, Oxford Street, Mayfair, London

item.title: W9 2EX - corner of Shirland Road and Kilburn Park Road, 6th September
item.description:
The white lines on the zebra crossing are virtually invisible. They have faded very substantially. Today I witnessed a car accidentally go over the crossing without realising it was there, nearing killing a pedestrian. This is really dangerous.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shirland Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Building waste dumped on the street Sidney Road n22. Opposite 59 Sidney Road, 6th September
item.description:
Cinder blocks, bricks and wooden pallet dumped at the garages on Sidney Road N22. Dangerous and I’m sick of people dumping here

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 59, Sidney Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole roads need weeding, 6th September
item.description:
Brookdene Road, Blithdale Road, Bannockburn Road, Benares Road, St Nicholas Road, Kasghar Road, have not been swept in months. The weeds are really long, the gully’s are blocked. There’s one broken tree branch hanging down which is an accident waiting to happen. There’s leaves and rubbish everywhere on the pavement and roads. Please can you employ someone to tidy/ sweep our streets they are in a terrible state.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Benares Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road gully blocked, 6th September
item.description:
Road side fully blocked with leaves as road hasn’t been cleaned or swept for months. Water is building up and flooding the footpath. Gully on the junction between churchmanorway and Benares Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Benares Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
